title: Explaining Viewpoints
description: Learn how to express and support opinions politely at B1 level.

steps.teacher: 我覺得每個選擇都有它的好處與限制。
expected_answer: 我覺得每個選擇都有它的好處與限制。
steps.pinyin: wǒ jué dé měi gè xuǎn zé dōu yǒu tā de hǎo chù yǔ xiàn zhì.
steps.english_hint: I think every choice has its advantages and limitations.

steps.teacher: 在我看來，穩定比速度更重要。
expected_answer: 在我看來，穩定比速度更重要。
steps.pinyin: zài wǒ kàn lái, wěn dìng bǐ sù dù gèng zhòng yào.
steps.english_hint: In my view, stability is more important than speed.

steps.teacher: 我想先聽聽大家的意見，再做決定。
expected_answer: 我想先聽聽大家的意見，再做決定。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng xiān tīng tīng dà jiā de yì jiàn, zài zuò jué dìng.
steps.english_hint: I want to hear everyone’s opinions before deciding.

steps.teacher: 我同意你的部分想法，不過我有不同的看法。
expected_answer: 我同意你的部分想法，不過我有不同的看法。
steps.pinyin: wǒ tóng yì nǐ de bù fèn xiǎng fǎ, bú guò wǒ yǒu bù tóng de kàn fǎ.
steps.english_hint: I agree with part of your idea, but I have a different viewpoint.

steps.teacher: 我認為最重要的是找到平衡。
expected_answer: 我認為最重要的是找到平衡。
steps.pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zuì zhòng yào de shì zhǎo dào píng héng.
steps.english_hint: I believe the most important thing is to find balance.

steps.teacher: 你的建議很有道理，我會再仔細想想。
expected_answer: 你的建議很有道理，我會再仔細想想。
steps.pinyin: nǐ de jiàn yì hěn yǒu dào lǐ, wǒ huì zài zǐ xì xiǎng xiǎng.
steps.english_hint: Your suggestion makes sense; I’ll think about it more.

steps.teacher: 我想用另一個角度來說明。
expected_answer: 我想用另一個角度來說明。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng yòng lìng yí gè jiǎo dù lái shuō míng.
steps.english_hint: I’d like to explain from another angle.

steps.teacher: 我並不是不同意，只是想再補充一些細節。
expected_answer: 我並不是不同意，只是想再補充一些細節。
steps.pinyin: wǒ bìng bú shì bù tóng yì, zhǐ shì xiǎng zài bǔ chōng yì xiē xì jié.
steps.english_hint: I'm not disagreeing; I just want to add some details.

steps.teacher: 如果我們能整合不同想法，結果會更好。
expected_answer: 如果我們能整合不同想法，結果會更好。
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ men néng zhěng hé bù tóng xiǎng fǎ, jié guǒ huì gèng hǎo.
steps.english_hint: If we combine different ideas, the result will be better.

steps.teacher: 總之，我覺得討論越完整，決定就越清楚。
expected_answer: 總之，我覺得討論越完整，決定就越清楚。
steps.pinyin: zǒng zhī, wǒ jué dé tǎo lùn yuè wán zhěng, jué dìng jiù yuè qīng chǔ.
steps.english_hint: In short, the more complete our discussion is, the clearer the decision becomes.

review.summary: You learned B1 expressions for explaining and organizing viewpoints.
review.mission: Next lesson: Conversations involving reasoning and suggestions.
